args: I won't let you hurt them, Shirley.
You've actually taken on an adult form...\nWho ARE you, Notte?!
...No. It doesn't matter who you are.\nWhat I must do here remains unchanged!
(It's just like beforeâ€”I feel crazy strength\nbubbling up inside me.)
(Well, it'll have to be enough, because no\nfriend of mine is dying today!)
I won't let anyone get away with trying to\nhurt the people I love. Not even you!
(Such potent manaâ€”yet she was barely\nable to CONTROL mana just days ago!)
Tell me how to wake my friends up\nbefore I totally go ham on you!
The sleep of the lullaflies is temporary.\nYour friends will wake in time.
But why, Notte? Why do you go so far\nfor the sake of that human?
He's a dangerâ€”his mere EXISTENCE\nis a threat. And if you stay at his side,\nthat danger will fall on you.
Lady, my staying safe is literally\nthe least of my concerns.
We're friends. That's the end of it.
And we made a promise that no matter\nthe ordeal, we'd face it together.
So I'm gonna protect him.\nI'll make sure he never turns into the\nmonster you seem to think he is!
Ah. Now I understand how you\nwere able to take on that form.
You're asking advice of a person\nyou just bested in battle? Heh.
Well, I may as well tell you what I didn't\nget the chance to tell you before.\nOne final lesson, if you will.
There's not much else I can think of that it\nmight be, except...
I wasn't going to mention it because I\ndidn't think you were going to need it,\nbut a faerie's power is...
A faerie's power is tied to the strength\nof their own heart.
The stronger the feelings, the stronger\nthe technique they're able to wield.
From the first moment I met you,\nI could tell you already had such feelings,\nso didn't think it worth mentioning.
But I see now it was hardly scratching the\nsurface. I greatly underestimated you.
Er, so why teach me this now?
To be blunt. I don't see us being friends\nafter all this. I don't understand you,\nand I can't abide letting that human live.
But seeing you desperate to protect the\nones you care about? That I understand.
It's like I'm looking at my past self.\nAnd while I don't agree with your\nchoices, I can't turn my back either.
Don't forget what you felt in that moment;\nit is the key to controlling the technique.
Guys, look! Check me out!\nI learned how to change size at will!
Ya picked that up in the time\nit took us to have a nap?
Yeah, turns out I'm kind of a genius.
And now I can fight with you guys!
Ha ha! We'll rest easy knowing Notte\nthe mighty warrior has our backs.
He's a dangerâ€”his mere EXISTENCE\nis a threat. And if you stay at his side,\nthat danger will fall on you.
Er, do I have something on my face,\nNotte? Luca didn't draw on me while\nI was asleep again, did he?
Nope! You're good. Just spacing out.
But yeah, leave it to me, 'cause I'll keep\neverybody safe no matter what!
(No matter what the future holds,\nit doesn't change my job here.)
(I'll have the strength to fight now...)
Whatever happens, we'll tackle it\nas a teamâ€”and that's a Notte promise!
